name: nitsan/nitsan-hellobar
description: An API Integration for HelloBar.com - One of the most popular site! Integrate hellobar panel(s) with simple configuration from TYPO3 Backend & Displaying it at global to your TYPO3 site! Live-Demo: https://demo.t3planet.com/t3t-extensions/ You can download PRO version for more-features & free-support at https://t3planet.com/tyop3-hellobar-api-plugin-free/
